channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Oxstalls lane closed, 26th November
item.description:
Oxstalls lane entrance off Cheltenham road is closed. All roads surrounding as far as zoons court roundabout are gridlocked
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: FLytipping in Horsbere Brook, 26th November
item.description:
We have found a bed dumped in the Brook by the back entrance to our school. This is now collecting other rubbish, and building a dam. This is right by the entrance to our school There is a lot of other rubbish found dumped in the Brook, but the bed is the largest. We want to clean this part of the Brook. Can you help us Henleybank High School - Eco Council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Various forgotten road signs & portals after road works have finished, 26th November
item.description:
[Portable loo] left on the corner of Station Road- road works here finished week ago !! various road diversion signs left fallen near to the [portable loo]- opposite side of road at top of Station Road, 1 near St Andrewâ€™s Church & 1 left fallen top of Pirton Lane. Causing an obstruction to pavement & also very dangerous as not lit. A drive by needs to be done in the day light to collect all the left & forgotten signs, signstands, [portable loo] & sand bags
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near to railway bridge coming down Pirton lane from St Andrews church, 26th November
item.description:
Large pothole that was repaired a while ago, all tarmac washed out & opened up yet again ! Near to railway bright, coming down Pirton Lane from St Andrews Church. Hard to avoid unless you drive near to opposite side of road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loud clanging noise, 26th November
item.description:
Manhole cover is loose and makes a loud noise when traffic passes over it. Can be heard from quite a distance down Green Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 123, Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: National Grid unauthorised works and temporary lights, 26th November
item.description:
National Grid is carrying out unauthorised works and has setup unauthorised temporary traffic lights causing massive delays to traffic in the area. They aren't even working on the road. They have setup lights to provide themselves with parking when they could have parked around the corner or on the pavement where they are working.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 307, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole that can not be avoided as there are one lane roadworks, 26th November
item.description:
Just after he temp lights on lh side going towards Woodmancote
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury

item.title: 2 Really bad deep potholes, 26th November
item.description:
At the side of the road outside No. 202. These will force drivers into the oncoming lane. This whole road is in an unacceptable condition. These are 2 of many bad potholes along this road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 202, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Falling tree blocking pavement and road, 26th November
item.description:
The tree is leaning over after recent winds, entirely blocking the pavement and partly blocking the road. Has been like this for 2 days. Between Henley Bank High School and the skatepark. Students and other members of the public are walking out in front of oncoming cars.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
